phrases: Is he out of his mind?!
Chasing terrorists is not our job.
Destroy the Secrets before a fusion explosion.
That is the mission of IFO teams.
We do not have any spare time to take on extra tasks.
That much should be enough for him, do not you think?
This is unprecedented, but we are considering something serious.
That is not even a punishment!
We must not forget about what happened with team Goldilocks either.
We will trust you and we will not persecute this any further.
IFO pilots are like my children.
A father should trust his children.
You have no right to say that.
Hey, miss, give me a large cup of hot generation coffee!
Why are you guys following me?
Anyway, just stay away from me.
Was that supposed to be threatening?
Are you keeping Ao under surveillance?
You should be more discrete about it.
We have been ordered to do it like this.
You are putting pressure on him by being obvious?
That is not something you guys could come up with.
The president's orders, is not it?
I heard you are not getting along well with your dad.
He is not a big fan of his dad.
It showed up at a troublesome spot again.
The Allied Forces is contacting you, President.
I will take it in my office.
You lost a team in Columbia.
Then there was a terrorist attack.
You are piling up losses, Cristophe.
I am sorry for the trouble caused, Secretary of State.
I do not even want to think of what is coming.
Some of the senators are complaining that it is the lost Mark I,
which was built with our precious tax dollars.
They are trying to pressure the President by using the mass media.
They will not be picky with methods.
However, Nirvash and the Mark I are two different things.
But will the US government believe what you say?
It is still quite far away.
And what would we do if the enemy accelerated?
The moment the Secret showed up, our possible courses of action became limited to one.
Wait, so they were tailing me by the President's orders?
And he went on about fatherly trust and all that.
He does not mean what he says!
Oh, he said that to you too?
IFO pilots are like my children.
Is it a good idea to say that in front of his daughter?
This Secret is very similar to the one spotted in 1752 in Philadelphia, America.
At that time, lightning caused serious damages to places the Secret passed by.
The phenomenon we call lightning is the result of the difference in ionic charge exceeding a certain
The Triton is to return immediately.
What kind of an order is this?
He made some sort of deal in the background.
If that is the case, the only one who can put pressure on the President is the US government.
Faisal Arabia, the location where the Scub appeared, is the most prominent anti-US country in the Middle East.
America, on the other hand, antagonized Faisal Arabia as a supporter of terrorism,
making the two countries being constantly on the verge of war.
In the background of Faisal Arabia's anti-US position is the internal opposition of royal
If a fusion explosion occurred, it would seriously damage the enemy country,
and, at the same time, prevent the establishment of a plant coral.
Why would the President agree to such a thing?!
The deal must somehow be beneficial to the company.
Telling us to turn back here...
is telling us to watch them all die!
You are the same, right, Ao?
I heard about it from Gazelle.
Why do you work for your father's company if you hate him?
Five years ago, Maman and I got into a traffic accident.
If one of us donated our internal organs to the other, the other could survive.
When the doctors told my father that,
he chose me... and killed Maman.
If he had made the other choice back then, Maman would still be...
I hate my father for making me live with this burden.
So I do what annoys him the most.
Let us take a look at inside Faisal Arabia.
These are footages of the Abuha region where the G-Monster first appeared.
The governments of Britain, France, China and other countries
have voiced intent of immediate aid to the stricken country.
After seeing these footages, the public demanded that Faisal Arabia must be helped.
The Allied Forces had no choice but to agree.
They will not have it their way!
Let us show it to America and our stupid President!
This has to be a complete victory, right, Miss Fleur?
180 seconds until we reach the combat area.
We have got visual on the target.
The lightning is merely a side effect of the expulsion of ionized particles from the Secret.
A Secret normally does not attack IFOs as the trapar field shields them.
However, the lightning is an electric discharge independent of the Secret's intent, so be careful.
The lightning can strike outside of the ZOA.
The IFOs are equipped with electricity discharge shields for immediate protection,
but if you get hit directly, the lightning may cause system errors.
Be careful of this as well.
You are just telling us to be careful, but what exactly are we supposed to do?
He makes it sound so simple.
Leave your complaints back in the ship.
You are outside of the Zone there.
A hot day in Little Russia...
The amount of charged particles is increasing by 250 per second.
The charged area is likewise growing.
Nirvash and Alleluia, wait for my orders.
Our strategy will not work without Kyrie!
The Secret has emitted all charged particles it had stored up, and has started lifting.
It is expected to stop in 75 seconds.
The destination of its trajectory is...
Is it going for a direct impact?!
Alleluia is too lightly armed for this!
I do not want to lose this fight.
I absolutely cannot lose this fight.
I do not care about what happens to me.
The Secret has reached 7500 feet above Faisal Arabia.
It has lost its thrust and is beginning its descent.
But I will not risk my life for him.
I will stay alive no matter what and give him a good beating.
So you must not die either, Fleur!
Nirvash and Alleliua have reached the Secret.
Georg, how is Alleluia and Nirvash?
Alleluia and Nirvash are both intact.
Life signals have been detected, so it is safe to assume the pilots are unhurt.
We must report our victory to him.
I wonder what face he is making...
Maybe the Americans spanked him and he is crying!
Oh, look who we have got there.
Both of you have left your designated locations without permission during an operation.
I would like to talk about that.
there were immediate reports that we are not there despite an official request.
They thought we are the source of such reports.
Of course I told them I did not know anything about it.
By the way, why did you stay despite receiving the return order?
We had some difficulties fixing it.
The President was behind those footages...
He lied to the whole world.
But we were able to go back because of that.
Wait a second, when did you start dropping the Miss?
Next time on Eureka Seven AO.
The man wishing for change to create something new summons melancholic memories from the past.
What does the one from the jet black depth offer to the man,
and what does it show to the boy?
Eureka Seven AO, episode nine: In The Dark We Live.
Listen to the voices of the children of the stars.
Sign: Fleur Blanc's Official Blog First Contact

tameiki wo tsuite sora wo miru
aoku somerareta hitomi no oku de kagayaiteru no wa

so I sigh and look up at the sky
Shining deep within my eyes, reflecting its blue,
is a dreamer who can overcome anything
are dyed by rainbows and fly

My heart is racing and beating loud
Even if the wind is blowing hard
Do not close your eyes and always look on ahead
If you feel like crying, remember
The young birds in the sky sing
though they still cannot fly well
Even if we go beyond the edge of time
I will only follow you as we hold hands
So I never let you go!
may get lost in the infinity of the sky,
I can still find you without hesitation
